name: III. “VAMPIRE”
description:
3/8 from “Nightmares” collection.
It’s a collection created to celebrate Halloween that revives the most common and darkest nightmares that haunt the human being. 8 collectible card amulets that explain the most terrifying fears and give protection to those who have them.

Description of the piece:
Generally, dreaming about a vampire symbolizes physical or mental illness. The figure of the vampire is also related to seductive and sexual obsessions. This refers to you having an erotic fantasy about a person.
Dreaming about vampires may have the purpose of alerting you on how to react about people who come unexpectedly into your life or social environment. You should be wary of those negative people who can steal your energy in any area of your life. 
If you are bitten by a vampire, it means that you are in a state of weakness and unwillingness to achieve anything. 
Also, it could mean that you are being a victim of some manipulative and interested person, who only wants to have you for convenience.

1157x1600px

Full story here: nft.matiasmarano.com/nightmares
